dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 22.8 × 30.2 cm (9 × 11 7/8 in.)
inscribed:
Inscribed and initialed in plate, lower left to right: • P • brueghel • Inuentor • / IRA / • H • Cock • excude • cum gratia et privilegio • 1558

Initialed in plate, lower center: P / AVE

Two lines in Latin below image, lower center: ORA TVMENT IRA, NIGRESCUNT SANGUINE VENAE … et maeckt swert dat bloet
